LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.0.label: Half Elf
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.0.description: An artificial race created by mankind using the genes of Ancient Elves and humans.
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.1.label: Ancient Elf
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.1.description: A race said to have been created long ago by an ancient race with great technology.
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.2.label: Drake
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.2.description: A powerful race whose origins and other details are completely unknown. Like the ancient elves, they are thought to have been created by an ancient race with great technology.
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.3.label: Wolfen
LanguageData.AS_SpeciesType.degreeDatas.3.description: An artificial race created by mankind using genes from the ancient wolf species and humans.
LanguageData.AS_OdControlFactor.degreeDatas.1.label: Od Control Factor
LanguageData.AS_OdControlFactor.degreeDatas.1.descrip: Factor to control od energy. It is needed to use various skills with od energy, such as physical boosting.
